scripts.start: AGENTS=1 BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(get-port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(get-port) npm run network
scripts.dev: VITE_ADMIN_PORT=$(get-port) VITE_APP_PORT=$(get-port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(get-port) BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(get-port) UI_PORT=8888 npm run x
scripts.x: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run start:happ" "hc run-local-services -b $BOOTSTRAP_PORT -s $SIGNAL_PORT"
scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:happ"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.start:happ: echo "starting with admin $VITE_ADMIN_PORT" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=$VITE_ADMIN_PORT --piped generate workdir/summon.happ --run=$VITE_APP_PORT -a summon network -b "http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc "ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT"
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
